TEXT.TITLE: RLR FINANCIAL SERVICES <RLRF> TO MAKE STATEMENT
TEXT.BODY: RLR Financial Services said it will be releasing a statement shortly concerning the company. RLR's stock was halted this morning for news pending by the NASDAQ. Reuter
